## CredentialWallet.save() method

saves W3C credential (upsert)

**Signature:**

```typescript
save(credential: W3CCredential): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  credential | [W3CCredential](./js-sdk.w3ccredential.md) | credential to save |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;void&gt;

`Promise<void>`
